page.title: 17PARENTS SCHOOLDAYS SURVEY
page.content: We did a survey to find out what our parents' schooldays were like. All parents were born between{1945 {and 1952.}12 did not go to Blyth schools but 28 between them went to every school in Blyth. 27{walked}to school, 8{cycled,}4 {bused,}1 went by{train.} 32 were in classes of 30-35pupils,4 under 25 and 4 over 40.34 were in mixed classes and 31 wore uniforms. School began by 9am.36 finished between 3.45 and 4pm. 8 had 1hr. lunch 32 had 1hr.30mins. 10 went home. 32 pupils left school at 15yrs, 6 at 16yrs, and 2 at 18yrs. 38 found work immediately, 2 went to college. Punishments:-cane30,lines20,detention2 0,belt14,ruler12.
